title: GICS Pipeline: S&P Data Processing
summary: S&P Global Industry Classification Standard (GICS) data pipeline. Source paths cwiq-pipe/env[1-3]/gics/ converge to single gics_direct/ target. Shovel uses ZIP expansion with virtual paths - extracts ZIP contents and maps internal files to flat structure. Key regex pattern: (?P<package>bgicshglb03|pkgGIC01)\.(?P<date>\d{8})\.zip with virtual_path {package}/{filename}. Compression flow: ZIP input â†’ LZ4 output, but grabber map only handles ZIP passthrough (no LZ4). Products directory currently unmapped. Package status: 2 available (bgicshglb03, pkgGIC01), 23 missing from source including asc/bgicshglb03, busdescl, caintl, CompustatRefDataV2, seg, segh etc.

comments.content: Grabber map pattern ^env[123]/gics/(?P<filename>.*\.zip)$ maps to gics_direct/{filename}. Missing patterns: *.asc.zip, *.txt.NN.lz4, *.cnt.NN.lz4. Two options: Option 1 ZIP passthrough only (current, simple), Option 2 full shovel mimic (adds products/ pattern). Recommendation: start Option 1, extend later if products needed.

Available packages: bgicshglb03, pkgGIC01. Missing 23 packages: asc/bgicshglb03, busdescl, caintl, caintntl, caprihistxna, caref, caustic, CompustatRefDataV2, epsalloc, globsupp, gvissue, ii, iqr, sec_mshare, secidcusiphist, secidisinbycusiphist, secidsedolintlhist, secidsedolnahist, secidtichist, secidunlicisinhist, seg, segh, suppcxf.
